name: Nonconventional uses; department of health; approval and authorization; Waimano ridge
text: [§171-64.5]  Nonconventional uses; department of health; approval and authorization; Waimano ridge.  The department of health shall provide at least ninety days notification to the affected neighborhood boards and legislators that represent the district where Waimano ridge is located, and obtain the approval of the governor prior to new uses or the expanded use of the land as a sex offender treatment facility, drug treatment facility, state laboratory, or other uses. [L Sp 2005, c 7, §2]
